feed.title: Notesnook Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Notesnook: Notesnook Android v2.6.16
entry.content:
What's Fixed

  1. This release fixes android Github releases showing beta notifications.

entry.title: New release for Notesnook: Notesnook Desktop v2.6.16
entry.content:
üåü Features & new stuff

  1. Toggle highlight/text color in the editor directly by clicking on it by @alihamuh in https://github.com/streetwriters/notesnook/pull/4330
  2. Copy images by right clicking in the desktop app (just like in browsers) by @alihamuh in https://github.com/streetwriters/notesnook/pull/4373
  3. View and remove custom dictionary words in Settings > Editor > Spell check by @alihamuh in https://github.com/streetwriters/notesnook/pull/4362
  4. Configure custom proxy URL to route all network traffic via a proxy (desktop only) by @alihamuh in https://github.com/streetwriters/notesnook/pull/4196
  5. Sort reminders based on their due date by @alihamuh in https://github.com/streetwriters/notesnook/pull/3394
  6. Restore backups using encryption key in addition to password by @thecodrr in https://github.com/streetwriters/notesnook/pull/4355
  7. Checklists from Google Docs are now preserved on paste by @alihamuh in https://github.com/streetwriters/notesnook/pull/3456
  8. Toggle markdown shortcuts in the editor by @alihamuh in https://github.com/streetwriters/notesnook/pull/4041

üêõ Fixes & improvements

  1. Fix app autostart for AppImage on Linux by @alihamuh in https://github.com/streetwriters/notesnook/pull/4223
  2. Fix editor text is not selectable from margins by @alihamuh in https://github.com/streetwriters/notesnook/pull/4292
  3. Fix some characters not rendering correctly in math blocks by @alihamuh in https://github.com/streetwriters/notesnook/pull/4353
  4. Fix column toolbar position when table is scrolled horizontally by @alihamuh in https://github.com/streetwriters/notesnook/pull/4366
  5. Fix new lines from google docs not being preserved on paste by @alihamuh in https://github.com/streetwriters/notesnook/pull/3988
  6. Improve reliability when changing account password by @thecodrr in https://github.com/streetwriters/notesnook/pull/3689
  7. Fix login stuck after an error
  8. Fix very rare data corruption during sync due to a bug in the SignalR MessagePack protocol
  9. Fix issue where locking a note did not update its status in the list

Full Changelog: https://github.com/streetwriters/notesnook/compare/v2.6.15...v2.6.16

entry.title: New release for Notesnook: Notesnook Android v2.6.17
entry.content:
üåü Features & new stuff

  1. Configure custom proxy URL to route all network traffic via a proxy (desktop only) by @alihamuh in https://github.com/streetwriters/notesnook/pull/4196
  2. Sort reminders based on their due date by @alihamuh in https://github.com/streetwriters/notesnook/pull/3394
  3. Restore backups using encryption key in addition to password by @thecodrr in https://github.com/streetwriters/notesnook/pull/4355
  4. Checklists from Google Docs are now preserved on paste by @alihamuh in https://github.com/streetwriters/notesnook/pull/3456
  5. Toggle markdown shortcuts in the editor by @alihamuh in https://github.com/streetwriters/notesnook/pull/4041

üêõ Fixes & improvements

  1. Improve reliability when changing account password by @thecodrr in https://github.com/streetwriters/notesnook/pull/3689
  2. Fixed a crash when doing a search in attachments manager

entry.title: New release for Notesnook: Notesnook Desktop v2.6.17
entry.content:
üêõ Fixes & improvements

  1. Make opfs safer by allowing only 1 operation at a time
  2. Make attachment downloading more resilient to errors
  3. Fix pull failed error when downloading attachments
  4. Fix cannot read properties of undefined (reading 'hash') error on sync
  5. Fix cannot read property integration of undefined in web app

entry.title: New release for Notesnook: Notesnook Android v2.6.18
entry.content:
Fixes and improvements

  1. Fix app lock screen shows above session expired screen if user puts the app in background
  2. Fix cannot read properties of undefined (reading 'hash') error on sync
  3. Fix Github release always shows "Update available" noticed with v3 beta update information
